item.title: Your news link is broken
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Well then lets re-write them. I’ll do it right here:

Join the moparisthebest.com/moparisthebest.com official IRC channel! To learn how to, click here!

Join the moparisthebest.com/moparisthebest.com official IRC channel! To learn how to, click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,237059.0.html]here[/url]!

[hr]

Need help developing your new RS2/RSC private server? Ask here!

Need help developing your new RS2/RSC private server? Ask [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php]here[/url]!

[hr]

Need somewhere to advertise your server? Use the new and improved server status page!

Need somewhere to advertise your server? Use the new and improved [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php]server status page[/url]!

[hr]

Be careful when downloading all files people have sent you, as they may contain Trojans, Viruses, and Keyloggers.

Use your common sense, and scan everything before opening it. Click here for more information.

[code]Be careful when downloading all files people have sent you, as they may contain Trojans, Viruses, and Keyloggers.

Use your common sense, and scan everything before opening it. Click here for more information.[/code]

[hr]

Those are the major ones, the SCAR one should just be a download I think, but that’s an administrator’s decision. All other’s have been re-written with updated links.

Read full topic
